Desc.eng: Oh, it’s the hunter again! I’m glad to see you!
Before you run away again, please tell me how to get to Borgova.
If you want to reach Borgova, you must travel through the old mines to the other side of the mountain.
But you have to use the ancient Inkgate in the swamps. It opens into the tunnels.
It’s not easy to find your way around here.
